src:
Tatá Werneck revela que já está casada com Rafael Vitti
Ela publicou foto assinando documento no sofá de casa
06 Nov 2019, 16:54 by Redação
A apresentadora Tatá Werneck anunciou nesta quarta-feira (6) que se casou com o ator Rafael Vitti. Ela publicou uma foto em que os dois aparecem com amigos assinando um documento. Na legenda, escreveu que se casou ainda grávida da filha Clara, que nasceu há duas semanas, em casa. 
"Hoje meu amigo querido @julianoezuel perguntou quando iríamos marcar nosso casamento. É porque a gente não divulgou para ninguém. Mas já somos casados. Casamos com a roupa que a gente tava mesmo", escreveu a humorista.



Os padrinhos foram o humorista Gabriel Louchard e a diretora criativa Natalia Paes. Tatá aproveitou para brincar com o marido. "Acabei casando com a única roupa que tava cabendo em mim naquele momento. Rafa não tem desculpa. Não se arrumou mesmo. Te amo @rafaavitti", finalizou.
text:
Tatá Werneck reveals that she is already married to Rafael Vitti
She posted photo signing document on home sofa
06 Nov 2019, 16:54 by Writing
The presenter Tatá Werneck announced on Wednesday (6) that she has married actor Rafael Vitti. She published a photo in which the two appear with friends signing a document. In the caption, she wrote that she was still pregnant with her daughter Clara, who was born two weeks ago at home.
"Today my dear friend @julianoezuel asked when we would schedule our wedding. It's because we did not disclose to anyone. But we are already married. We married the clothes we were really," wrote the humorist.



The groomsmen were the humorist Gabriel Louchard and the creative director Natalia Paes. Tata took the opportunity to play with her husband. "I ended up marrying the only outfit that was fitting for me at that time. Rafa has no excuse. He didn't really get ready. I love you @rafaavitti," he said.
